text: Ebam naridera madhye tadera chara sakala sadhaba striloka tomadera jan'ye nisid'dha; tomadera daksina hasta yadera malika haye yaya-eta tomadera jan'ya allahara hukuma. Ederake chara tomadera jan'ye saba nari halala kara hayeche, sarta e'i ye, tomara taderake sbiya arthera binimaye talaba karabe bibaha bandhane abad'dha karara jan'ya-byabhicarera jan'ya naya. Anantara tadera madhye yake tomara bhoga karabe, take tara nirdharita haka dana kara. Tomadera kona gonaha habe na yadi nirdharanera para tomara paraspare sam'mata ha'o. Niscaya allaha subijna, rahasyabida.
